Detailed Description

This class handles text objects. This class is derived from Object.
Author:
Anthony Liekens

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Text::TextJustifications
 

Enumeration of text justifications. The following justifications can be used to set the justification of a text object : {\tt LeftJustified, CenterJustified, RightJustified}

Enumeration values:
LeftJustified 
CenterJustified 
RightJustified
